main.name: London KCYL
main.description: Welcome to London Knanaya Catholic Association. LKCYL is a group consisting of KCYL members from from all of London region knanaya units. The pourpose of LKCYL is to unite all Knanaya Catholics who are living in the London region, so that we can create a common platform for promoting family unity, educational activities, and become an institution to meet the social and welfare needs irrespective of place, race and community
main.extra: have limited spaces and will be accepting people on a first come first service basis so please register for the camp providing your details below.
main.soldout: We are currently fully booked and have stoped registration, if there are any cancelations we will reopen the registration please keep an eye on this page.
